name: Google Plus for widescreen - normal chat bar
description:
Modification of the new (April 2012) Google+ design for higher desktop resolutions (1280px wide or more). The stream content is centered and wider, but it also contains several tweaks or modifications such as removing the ugly black background on inline images in posts and many other, and also fixes some bugs/problems on Google's side in Opera. There's also a slightly different version of this style with narrow right side chat bar available from me.

Made primarily with Opera 11.6x in mind, but tested in current Chrome and Firefox as well.
additional_info:
Current version - 0.8 (updated 25.4. 2012)

For more info please see http://english.edgeoftheworld.cz/2012/04/16/google-user-style-for-widescreen/

Please bear in mind that it's mostly a hack, so there could be some issues (I'll try to fix them if I get reports and manage to duplicate them) and it can also stop working at any moment due to Google changing their code.
